page.title: 17Education - continued
page.content: Most of {Solway Community School}was built in {1939. }This replaced the old building which is now the canteen. The {R.A.F.}took over the school during the War so the pupils had to travel twelve miles daily to{Wigton}for education. A library block was added in{1965,}and a science and needlework block in{1978. The{Acting Head}is{Mr.N.Gann}who has a staff of{21}with{270}pupils. Everyone does English and Maths; after the 3rd year the pupils choose their own exam. subjects. The organised games are from football,rugby,netball, cross-country, cricket,rounders, swimming, athletics. There are opportunities during regular {'openings days'} for pupils to take part in lots of different activities like camping, sailing, bird-watching, etc. There are{work-experience schemes and help from the Careers Officer on what to do after leaving school.
